content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 12 Feb 2019Is there an Investment-related wiki that is available?Is there a wiki that provides all different investment terms/jargon that beginners can explore? To find a concise or summarized explanation on terms like NAV or Factor-investing etc?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Yeo Enk LouiLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 12 Feb 2019Hey there!For a start, perhaps you can check out Investopedia (https://www.investopedia.com/) which gives a very concise explaination of the concepts that you just mentioned. On top of explainations, Investopedia also provides video examples for people who are more visually inclined.Some other plus points of Investopedia is that it covers many aspects of investing, beyond the 2 concepts that you just brought up. For instance, it also teaches you the basics and foundations of investing as well as introduce you to financial assets such as deriatives.Hope you find this to be helpful!0 comments2
